# fullScreenModeWindowLevel

**Type Property**

Key whose corresponding value specifies the screen mode window level.

## Declaration

```swift
static let fullScreenModeWindowLevel: NSView.FullScreenModeOptionKey
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] containing an integer value.

## Type Properties

- **fullScreenModeAllScreens**: Key whose corresponding value specifies whether the view should take over all screens.
- **fullScreenModeApplicationPresentationOptions**: Key whose corresponding value specifies the application presentation options.
- **fullScreenModeSetting**: Key whose corresponding value specifies the full screen mode setting.
